attributes.action: Ban foreign companies and people from donating to British political entities
attributes.additional_details:
We can all clearly see that foreign entities do not have the British publics best interests at heart and their lobbying has deeply effected our nation. 
Therefore, we must take action now.
To Ban non British people from donating to British Politics
To Ban non British companies from donating to British Politics
To Ban non British entities from donating to British Politics
To make all British Political campaigns be only funded by British Subjects
To ensure the safety of our nation.
attributes.background:
Too long have foreign entities been able to donate money to our political entities and sway public opinion in our general elections.
We can see the rise of Russian donations in Europe starting to destabilise the foundations of Europe, and we as a country need to take action before it's too late.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign the following petition, which calls for similar action: 
Tighten the rules on political donations
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/707189
